monsters.name: Ajarakan
monsters.description: unknown

monsters.name: Arkveld
monsters.description: unknown

monsters.name: Balahara
monsters.description: Desert-dwelling leviathans that use their supple, serpentine bodies to create quicksand traps. Weak against sonic bombs when they're submerged.

monsters.name: Chatacabra
monsters.description: Amphibians that affix rocks to their forelimbs to power up attacks. Break this 'armor' to create an attack opening. The tongue is most vulnerable.

monsters.name: Congalala
monsters.description: Large, pink-furred Fanged Beasts with an incredible appetite - especially for mushrooms, which the monster often carries around with them. They let rip the most almighty farts, the stench of which overwhelms opponents.

monsters.name: Doshaguma
monsters.description: Rugged, territorial fanged beasts that exhibit an aggressive disposition and inhabit a large range. Sometimes observed in large packs.

monsters.name: Gore Magala
monsters.description: Gore Magala possess wings with black, shroud-like membrane. They lack visual receptors, heightening their senses by scattering scales from their wings to ascertain the locations of lifeforms. At the peak of their senses, feelers extend from their head, their wings unfurl, and they become frenzied. They're feared not only for their sinister appearance but also for the mysterious Frenzy virus they carry.

monsters.name: Gravios
monsters.description: Flying Wyverns that inhabit volcanic regions. Capable of attacking with fiery breath and sleeping gas. The carapace-like bone they have developed on their bodies for protection are incredibly hard.

monsters.name: Gypceros
monsters.description: These Bird Wyverns strike their crests to generate blinding flashes that dazzle their enemies. Their skin has elastic properties similar to rubber, and the volatile venom produced in their mouths can easily disintegrate any surrounding vegetation.

monsters.name: Hirabami
monsters.description: unknown

monsters.name: Lala Barina
monsters.description: unknown

monsters.name: Nerscylla
monsters.description: Temnocerans that build nests of sticky webbing. They rend prey with their pincer-like jaws after weakening them with abnormal statuses and ensnaring them in web. They will sometimes adorn themselves with the skin of morsels they have not completely finished eating.

monsters.name: Nu Udra
monsters.description: The cephalopod that reigns supreme over Oilwell Basin's ecosystem. A vision of hell, it attacks with tentacles and ignited oilsilt.

monsters.name: Quematrice
monsters.description: unknown

monsters.name: Rathalos
monsters.description: Terrible wyverns called 'Kings of the Skies'. Along with Rathians, they stake wide territories centered around their nests. Rathalos descend on invaders from the sky, attacking with poison claws and breath of fire.

monsters.name: Rathian
monsters.description: Known by the alternative name of 'Queen of the Land.' With its outstanding leg strength, it hurtles across the land, subduing prey with its venom-laden tail. It has occasionally been spotted hunting together with its male counterpart, Rathalos.

monsters.name: Rey Dau
monsters.description: The flying wyvern that reigns supreme over the Windward Plains' ecosystem. It is able to store, amplify, and discharge the Sandtide's lightning.

monsters.name: Rompopolo
monsters.description: unknown

monsters.name: Uth Duna
monsters.description: unknown

monsters.name: Yian Kut-Ku
monsters.description: These monsters boast ample beaks and fan-like ears that splay open when angered. A cowardly species, they have dexterous, nimble legs perfect for running away. However, they show little mercy to smaller creatures that encroach on their territory.
